verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It is now that my life is mine
I've got this short time on earth
And my longing has brought me here
All I lacked and all I gaint

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And yet it's the way that I chose
My trust was far beyond words
That has shown me a little bit
Of the heaven I've never found

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I want to feel I'm alive
All my living days
I will live as I desire
I want to feel I'm alive
Knowing I was good enough

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I have never lost who I was
I have only left it sleeping
Maby I never had a choice
Just the will to stay alive

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All I want is to be happy being who I am
To be strong and to be free
To see the day arise from night

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I am here and my life is only mine
And the heaven I thought was here
I'll discover it there somewhere

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: I want to feel that I've lived my life
